content.detailedDescription: Hello, i'd like to share what i saw today for science. i live in an apartment where cars are subject to tow so i always need to get up early in the morning to move my car. i got up and walk to my car to move it which is about 300 feet from my apartment. as i was getting in to my car i happened to look up and saw a black object in the sky. i am used to seeing helicopters and military aircraft in the area since this is north san diego. but i knew right away something was different about this object. it was far away enough that it just looked like a baloon. luckily enough i had my binoculors in my car which they said 10 x 30 on them. as i observed the craft it had an irregular flight pattern.. (going up and down left and right). as i focused in with my binoculors i could tell right away what it was. there first thing i noticed every now and then on it was it had what appeared to be a set up lights on what appeared to be fins on the craft. as i observed it spin it appeared to be shape shifting and spinning its mass as it was moving with some lights visible. once i saw that i started to get excited and look for any other person in the area to point out what i was seeing. i kept an eye on it as i was moving, i found to construction workers talking in their trucks and walked up and pointed to what i was looking at. they thought it was a balloon but with my binoculors i could see what it really was.. as all this was going on it was drifting south east and gaining altitude. i did get a view of the craft when it was not shape shifting and it was diamond/teardrop in shape and had an organic appearance with fins in the middle with low light lights on it. the surface had a vein like appearance of something like a vegetable with black and dark red in a striped like organic way. i may have seen a windscreen but it was too far too tell. after seeing that i ran back to my apartment to get my camera and try and get a view shots through my binoculors but by the time i came back out it had already been lost in to the clouds. i have a broad knowledge of all kinds of aircraft and balloons and can say this was not like anything i have every seen in my entire life and has changed my perception about life as i know it. i have attached a sketch and a video of the area of its flight. sadly i could not get any hard evidence of it.
content.summary: Tear drop shaped black shape shifting craft with lights

content.detailedDescription:
During performing my night shift works( assembling building constructions) i
raised my head up and saw that four lights(three in the triangle shape and one further)flew over the seashore line in the direction from north to south.
no sounds, no blinking. all lights had the same color. after half minute all lights turned to the west( in the sea)without changing general form(like a solid objects). turning was close to plane turning(with sloping to the left side). after turning was finished and ufo took horizontal position. lights are disappeared. 
it was huge object on the low altitude. all peoples that were on the roof in that time(3-4 people)saw this object.
on the video is possible to see only back two lights.
biggest light on the photos-hotspot from the street lights.
content.summary: Three static lights in the shape of the huge triangle flying on the low altitude

content.detailedDescription: Google earth antire rd and 44 federal land also  boy scout camp and a farmers land on the hill behind his place there on both sides of hwy it public on my facebook page and no one has a comment. these are not environmental.
content.summary: You can see them from google earth 20 to 30 of theses asterisks and circles huge

content.detailedDescription:
I have been stocked, terrorized and poisoned, for over three (3) years.  i started documenting the vehicles that were stoking me, taking photographs and recording tag numbers.  when i looked at the photographs i noticed that the driver's were not human - they had heads, but their necks were either tubes or metal boxes and there was no steering wheel.  i also noticed that there were drone and/or ufo's in the photographs - that seemed to be connected to the vehicles - they never separated.  i started taking more photographs - which makes them very angry and the terrorism kept escalating.  i took pictures of et's that were landing in my trees and on my neighbor's roofs.  when i tried to look at them - i couldn't see anything - because they have special lights that distort the photographs, so i tricked them and started taking pictures when they least expected me to and was able to get some photographs of them - that you can actually see who they are.  they have air craft that i have never seen and land in the trees, on roof tops and hoover in the ski above my residence 24.7.  i woke up one night and i could see someone standing above my head, dressed in black, with black gloves and suddenly the glove came down over my face and that's all i remember.  when i woke-up in the morning i was soaking wet, could barely move and my hair was in knots - all tangled up like a rats nest - at the back of my neck - it has some type of substance in it and was pretty nearly impossible to brush out - i had to cut some of it out, to get the paste stuff out of it.  that has happened to me a few times and i have bruises on my arms, knees and ankles.  i also have an v shaped scar on the top of my head and the only reason i noticed it was because it was hurting and i keep having headaches.  when i touched the spot of my head (the left side of my crown) it was wet and when i went to wash my hands - they were all red - because my head was bleeding and i didn't even notice until i saw my hands.
i need help - i am in dire straights and exhausted.  i have been running from these extraterrestrial beings, from coast to coast, no body believes me - that's debilitating and traumatizing in itself - let alone having these things all over you...They have me cornered over here and i am week from the poisoning.  i don't want to see them anymore - i want them to leave - i want my life back - can you help me?
thank you for your time and consideration.
sincerely,
rochelle richards
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have been targeted by ufo's and et's and terrorized.  they are chamillions, exptremely difficult to detect and dont want to be seen.

content.detailedDescription: It was just 2 mins event while i was waiting for the traffic signal. my kid wants me to see an arrow in the sky, when i look i found a long cockpit type conical flying object just self revolving and passing over a big cloud to another small cloud, but when it cross the second small cloud its just disappeared. its never returned.
content.summary: A white colored self-revolving cone

content.detailedDescription:
During my night shift i observed three ufo objects of the same type like over netanya one year before. but in this time at the same time and area there were at least two helicopters and one jet aircraft. in the begining both(one object and helicopter) moved on the circle trajectory but different altitude(ufo was higher). after that i shoot only the ufo object that flew near industrial building. unfortunately in this time i had only htc cellular phone in my hand. that's why quality of the video is less than it was in netanya.But objects were the same shape and performed the same blinking.
suddenly i saw that helicopter was fling in the close to the ufo region and it was possible to shoot them together. it was only time question. at the same time.I understand that ufo isn't alone. in the sky were two ufo!
after short time i had to came back to work but sometimes i had watched the sky. helicopters disappeared. but objects not. moreover number of ufo grow up to three!
it was happened exactly year after my first meeting with ufo(20.03.2012).It was the first day of the us president obama visit to the israel.
content.summary: Three blinking lights in the form triangle( exactly like in the netanya case year before)-3 objects.
I have seen ufo triangular shape in the sky, which was colored silver, the metal was shining brightly; there was no light out there. he suddenly wakes up and disappears.

content.detailedDescription: Early into night dogs oon this 5 acre tract began barking incessantly.   at the back of the property was what appeared to be someone with a flashlight weaving thru the brush.Two   turning to grab a flashlight, then back around and it was gone.   it is not possible to walk thru this brush without a flashlight at night.   i called my neighbor on adjoining 10 acres to see if he was looking for a lost goat, and he said he had not been out.   two nights later, inclement weather from the west brought this property owner outside.   while facing the west at my property line, i observed two fuzzy blue balls moving slowly (at waist height) north along the property line emitting a bright white light as would a flash light.   the lights moved in front of and by me, white beams changing direction as would a person in a hurry, then both lights went out, leaving two fuzzy transparent blue balls moving in the air for a second, then all was gone.
content.summary: Observed two orbs emitting white light while randomly panning at night.

content.detailedDescription:
Orange county resident notices a strong orange colored orb in the night sky (completely clear).  i am outside, throwing the ball for my border collie and all of a sudden i see about 25-30degrees this the ball of light pulsing 3 seconds glowing orange color (litte smaller than aspirin size), then 3 seconds it looked like an orange speck, maybe a little bigger than a star.
at first i thought this was a helicopter, i see other planes in the night sky.  but once i noticed the sequential pulse of the glow i just starred at it.  it was coming from the south at 9:56 pm pacstd tme. i was kind of in awe in seeing this.  i believe the light was above the beach area and moved west where it got smaller and the pulse slowed to 4-5 sec apart over catalina island.  it eventually got smaller and smaller until i couldn't see it anymore.  i stood there for 3 minutes starring at where it had disappeared to, i neve saw it again.
content.summary: Glowing/pulsating orange/reddish orb observed going from south to west.  flashing 3 seconds glowing orange, then 3 seconds much smaller speck. speed slowed then speck disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I confer with a report from someone in cheshire oregon. on the 7th of july my wife and i observed a light similar to the iss traveling from the sw to the ne i am a long time sky watcher with a 10" dob and i've never seen anything like this. this was going at least 4x as fast as any satellite but it didn't appear to be as high as a normal satellite. i am 99% certain it was not an airplane because this looked to be reflective light. last night at approximately the same time 9:45 i saw it again. this time it was headed straight from the south and curved toward the northwest. i have witnessed iss many times and as the person in cheshire stated there were no iss passes scheduled for our area for days. i have had my eye to the sky for many many years and this is the first time i can honestly say i've seen something that can not be identified. the speed at which this object was traveling shook me, it had to be doing 40,000-50,000 miles per hour! if we have satellites that can travel that speed i would really like to know more! i would also like to compare notes with the person in cheshire, were only a few miles apart...I live in eugene.
content.summary: A bright magnitude object similar to iss traveling 4x normal speed of a satellite

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke a cigarette and look at my beautiful solar lights when i noticed an orange light between the trees moving to the east. i called my boyfriend out of the house and told him to hurry. we walked to the end of our short driveway to get a better look and it appeared to stop and then move toward us. then it went back to moving east. it either vanished or moved behind some clouds. we seen this light for approximately 3 minutes or so.  we thought it may of been one of those chinese lanterns but it would of burned up and fell to the ground as others i have seen. i do not believe this was a lantern. pretty cool to see for sure.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange ball moving east then hovering then coming toward my direction slowly then headed back to the east then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming back to my home from walking the dogs.  observed the pulsating white light with a steady light at one end of it.  at first i thought it was an airplane because it was in the flight path from chicago o'hare airport toward detroit metro.  however i have never seen an airplane with a  pulsating light and a steady white light at one end.  it did not have the other normal lights of an airplane.  i watched it for a couple minutes;it was moving the whole time but very slowly and then it started coming toward me only was farther north, it wasn't directly over me.  i brought the dogs back to the house and then came back outside.  this is when i saw two objects emitted from this pulsating light object.  the first object was a long thin blue
line that was headed east.  then the second object was emitted and it looked kind of like a shooting star except that it didn't come from higher up; it came from the craft and was headed north west.  i lost sight of the craft in the trees in my backyard and i came back to the house.
content.summary: Pulsatng cigar shaped object with steady white light at nose of craft

content.detailedDescription: Driving down the street at the same level as the moon, southwest, i initially thought what i saw was mars.  realizing it was too large for mars or a plane i stopped to watch it.  it was red to red orange and initially moving then remained still. it would move and stop and suddenly made a sharp turn to the west and immediately disappeared. before it disappeared i got my binoculars out and it jumped in the sky, made the sharp turn and disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observed a red object, larger than mars, watched it stay still, move forward, turn and disappear

content.detailedDescription: It was. 4th of july  veiwing fireworks. saw bright lifht miles ovove fireworks. brifht white lifht to yellow to orange to red. stayed redish orangecwhen moving disapeared apesred to the west then back east but changed direction straifht up till it disapeared. nothing falling can fo this. i daw many sightings in my life and continue till this day. i have it on film also had showed my girlfreind and neighbor objects while they were traveling. very awesome sighting. very excited that my girlfreind saw one with me. i know about them and i knew exactly what i was seeing.  im glad i had another sighting and hopevto learn more about them.
content.summary: Bright white to yellow than orange then red. like a fire moving slowly then straight up till it disapeared

content.detailedDescription:
I am a night so being up late and sometimes until daylight was not unusual.

i was sitting out on the patio relaxing between 11 p.M. and midnight. from the north i saw a speeding and erratic pattern heading due south. it was too far away and at too high an altitude for a detail description, but it looked white/silver.
it left a 'white' trail which is why i could see the pattern it traveled.
it went like this, at a high rate of speed making sharp corners in its changes of direction. it zipped across, then zipped down, then zipped across, then zipped up, then across, then down, then across, then up, repeat about 10 times. this lasted for about 30 seconds and then disappeared.  i sat out there for another half hour but it never returned.

i lived on 40 acres so it was quiet and no lights or reflections from my point of view.
content.summary: Relaxing late on patio behind house, facing east. saw erratic path of ufo at high speed for about 30 sec. then it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside clearing the snow off my porch when i sat down and took a break so i looked up to the stars and then i saw it  was a grey metallic orb that had a red flashing that was surrounded by a smoky orb that was glowing the trail behind the orb was a glowing smoke when ii first saw it i thought it was a plane due to the fact it had a red flashing light it drew a strait line and was out of my view. i thought i had at first like i said it was i plane that was crashing but after i got a good look at it i realized it wasn't as it seemed so i check out the direction it went in the next day in my snowmobile but found nothing. i can't judge the size of the object or altitude because it made no sound but it looked very large.
content.summary: Metallic object with red flashing light followed by a smoky trail almost fire like

content.detailedDescription:
I was living at my parents home at the time and went outside late in the evening to pick up the paper in the driveway. it was dark. i could hear the shouts and horns from the football stadium and could also see the 'glow' above the horizon of the brilliant stadium lights. i thought i saw a blimp but then realized it had colorful rotating lights. i watched it for a few minutes and then it started to move slowly, away from the stadium. at the time i could see it, it seemed to be heading north. then i lost sight of it.
i went inside and there was a 'breaking news' on t.V. of the sighting of a ufo over the stadium. a game was going on and everyone saw it.  i turned the radio on and there was a news broadcast dedicated to viewer call-ins and it had been seen that same day leaving the area of the pacific northwest. it had been sighted across kansas and picked up locally reporting the stadium sighting and then it went on with call-ins until it disappeared as it entered the area of the gulf of mexico. it was all the news for a couple of days and then it was not on t.V. or the radio after that. the local news media would not give any replies to the public's questions. that was the end of that.
content.summary: Went outside to pick up paper, saw "blimp"w/rotating lights over area of k.C. chiefs football stadium, listened to radio till 4 a.M.

content.detailedDescription: I had driven to the city to bring my mother home with me for a weeks visit. it would be a 3 hr. drive back. near midnight, halfway home, she spots the ufo. i stop the car to the side of the highway and we both get out to watch it. it is so black it is nearly impossible to see. it's moving so slow it looks like it's hardly moving at all. it's shaped like an elongated wide triangle. near the back two points of the triangle ends is a round bright white light. about 1/3rd toward the length and middle of the ufo (toward the elongated end..Which i would call the front)is a large round "light". it is bright red. at first i thought it was fire because it was either moving or pulsating. i just know it was red. i was concerned about traffic coming up from behind on the highway and i turned around and counted about 9 other vehicles that had stopped and the people were standing outside looking up at the ufo. it is not an understatement that the ufo could have very easily been as large as 8 football fields put together. what we were all seeing was the very bottom of the ufo. it continued to move very slow and never did make a sound. everyone watched it until it disappeared into the dark sky. there was no moon. my mother and i talked about what we had seen.
content.summary: Mother and i driving home, she sees the ufo, i stop the car to view it. about 9 other cars stop to view it also. we did not talk to them.

content.detailedDescription: I made a time-lapse video of the night sky, and i noticed that this object appeared out of nowhere.  i don't know what it is.
content.summary: Fuzzy object appears in night sky

content.detailedDescription: My relative and i were driving around the countryside at midnight. this was normal in a small town. no one else was around so we had decided to go back home. it was midnight and summer. i was driving. i didn't see it. she saw it first and said "did you see that?" i said "no." so i made a u-turn and when i turned the car back in the opposite direction i saw it. we were less than 1/4th mile from it. it was up in the air, hovering above the tree tops. we had previously passed the turn off to get close to it, so turned  and drove down a dirt road toward it, drove into a recently mowed pasture and stopped the car facing the ufo, and both of us got out and stood by the car, looking up at it, which was between 200-300 ft. away. neither one of us said anything. the object was very close and made no sound. it had a glowing aura around it. it was the shape of an upright cigar only much thicker around (like a rocket). guessing it might have been 100 feet across the front. it looked to have a wide 'belt' of multiple colors in yellow,red,orange, blue. it reminded me of an oriental pagoda because the top had appendages, four of which i could see. i would guess it was at least 30 stories high. i felt no fear and i was looking at it very hard to see as much as i could. neither one of us said anything. i'm sure we must have been standing there at least 10 minutes observing it. then all of a sudden, just like someone flicked a light switch, it disappeared. it was dark, quiet and we both got in the car, not saying a word. i drove us home. she stayed at my house that night. the next morning the incident was on my mind because i wanted to talk about it but neither one of us said anything about it. fast forward 2-3 yrs. later i brought the subject of that night up and she said it never happened. i said she was the one that saw it first and she was so upset she left. about 20 yrs. later i was at her family holiday dinner with all the family visiting with each other in the kitchen. she was slicing vegetables at the counter when all of a sudden she turned around and said to me, in front of everyone, "do you remember when we saw that ufo?" i was stunned. she went into a lively dialogue to everyone. i acknowledged what she said but i didn't really add to the conversation. everyone seemed to find it amusing and that was the end of that and it was never mentioned again. that was over 15 yrs. ago.
content.summary: Saw it hovering over treetops, drove up close and observed then it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of july 4, 2014, about 45 minutes or so after the fireworks, i was sitting on my porch when all of a sudden, i noticed a pretty large orange glowing object, floating across the sky.  it came from the north/west, heading south/east.  at first i thought it to be fireworks, but it wasn't.  i stepped off the porch and stood on the sidewalk watching this object.  as it headed south/east, it gained altitude, then changed to two red lights, one at the top and one at the bottom.  it then disappeared behind the tree tops.  there was no sound.
content.summary: Orange glowing object floated across sky

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in back passenger seat on my way home from work, it was 2:35 pm heading south on i-81 when we came around a bend, myself and a fellow passenger seen to the right a huge craft just hovering about no more than about 1000 feet off the ground. the object then began to head west and in an instant it flew in a southerly direction and had covered about 25 miles in less than 4 seconds. it then stopped above a hill and was just hovering. it was cloudy that day and this craft was sitting just underneath the cloud cover. a small portion of the top was covered by clouds but the rest was clearly visible. it was spinning so fast that a funnel cloud was spinning right under it that reached from the bottom of the craft to the ground. it was cigar shaped. the top and bottom half of the craft was a dark, dull flat black color and had 4 huge lights across the middle, each bigger than a basketball at arm's length. they were all lit, but the light to the left brightened then dimmed then the next one immediately to the right brightened and dimmed and repeated to all the other lights and then would start at the left light again. when we got off the highway it was still hovering and that spinning cloud was still underneath it. we turned left off the exit, pulled over on the bridge to get a better look at it. after watching it for a few minutes, we then continued west to the corner, turned right and headed south and was still able to see it over the hill then lost sight of it behind some buildings. the whole incident lasted more than 15 minutes and the entire time watching it, it did not make any sound.
content.summary: Huge dull black metallic cigar shaped craft with 4 large white pulsating and rotating lights in broad daylight flying west then south.

content.detailedDescription:
It was happened in the sky over netanya. i was by the way to home with my daughter.She watched in the sky for some time and asked me if it's ufo. i bring up my head and saw three blinking lights in the triangle form. in short time i came home took my camera( fuji 5700). my son was coming to us and we were walked around of the city center and shoot two video with this object.
on the video is possible to see street lights, houses,star if the sky. trajectory of the triangle was unpredictable. i've tried to shoot it with zoom? but in the night condition it wasn't easy. children feel fear and asked me to finish our "hunting".
content.summary: Ufo episode in the netanya skies 20.03.2012

content.detailedDescription: We were outside in the backyard, while me and my girlfriend were stargazing and my boys were roasting marshmallows. i saw a bright object in the sky, at first we thought it was a space station because it had a constant flight path, then it stopped in the sky and some clouds started to move in. then the ufo proceeded to move around like a bug in the sky then we started to record it or try to record it, almost none of our cameras picked it up not even our good camera could pick it up. my sons phone camera was able to pick it up while a plane flew by he recorded it for about a minute or so before he shut off his camera. the footage he caught wasn't very good but he tried to spiff it up on the computer. everyone else went inside after that point i stayed and my girlfriend brought me my binoculars and i looked at it. at this point to the naked eye we could see that it was under a cloud now which removed the idea that it was a space station because we could see that it was under a cloud. while i looked at it under binoculars i could see it was multiple lights around ten all white and i saw a triangular outline around it, it appeared black and it also shot out faint red orbs at different intervals, it also appeared to bend the cloud around it to it's whims also the red orbs went back to the object as well and was absorbed by the object, this went on for hours till the point my girlfriend wanted me to come in, and it was still out in the sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple lights would come out of the object while viewed under binoculars, while under the naked eye looked like 1

content.detailedDescription:
We had just watched the beautiful fireworks display in lake arrowhead, ca.  when it ended at 9:30pm, we expected my husband to pick us up but started to walk home, less than a mile away.  my daughter and i and her two boys were a block from home when he came up the street and we just looked up because our eyes caught sight of a really fast moving light overhead.  it was many times faster than say a jet and was pulsing every couple seconds so it looked almost as if it were jumping across the sky.   if you held up your hand to the sky and put your fingers about 1 1/2 " apart, that's how long it was from pulsating point to end of tail.  we were all sooo excited when we got in the car, all trying to tell my husband at the same time how we had just seen a ufo.  he is totally scientifically  minded and never believes alien/ufo stories because there is never proof, in his mind.  he was sorry he missed it so he could explain to us how it was not a ufo.  hah! 
so we drive the block or so home ( no street lights up here in the mountains) and when we all got out of the car and said let's look up and see if we see another ufo.  we hardly got the words out when we all, including the nonbeliever, saw more of the whitish blue, some pulsating but not all, ufos going in the same direction, at the same altitutude!  by more i mean maybe 15 to twenty more, going overhead in  5 or 10 second intervals!  my 11 yr old grandson kept saying," look nana there's another one!"  my husband thinks it was about a 40 degree unobstructed swath in the sky that they were traveling in and appeared to be in the exosphere.  he was at a loss for words to explain how they might have been meteors when one changed direction going slightly northwestward.  we stayed outside looking up for several more minutes  but apparently it was over.  we've been looking up nightly since and have seen nothing we don't normally see.  we could hardly get to sleep that night we were so excited.
content.summary: My husband, myself, grown daughter and her 2 sons saw  15-20 bluish white pulsing lights streak overhead at incredible speed, no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
1- i am watching out of my window.
2- coloured light and golf shape object.
3- i think that was a helicopter.
4- golf shape dark surface and 4-5 line of colored light and whir like sound and it is moving very slowly. 
5- first i think that was a helicopter and i think that where its sound and i thought that it is a ufo.
6- it is despair behind my front building and site of view.
content.summary: Golf like shape and frequent light and vrey slow speed moving

content.detailedDescription: The picture was taken in lesvos anaxos the 13th august 2013 from my mobile phone nokia x2-00 which has camera 5 mega pixels. it turns out very good photos for mobile but for some reason she has so little blurry. this was taken at 17.21 and i have another 3 foto free item at 17.20 and 17.22. that if it was some trash sand, dust, etc. and would therein. the weather was summer as far. also in anaxos not water sports and the particular day hadn't someone there some flighting games. these ones. get me out of curiosity! thank you!
content.summary: One triangle ufo

content.detailedDescription: After exiting the house to take dogs for a walk my wife and i were drawn to a bright yellow light and tail moving across the sky from se to west. we thought it might have been a plane on fire at first but there was no noise and it was moving faster than a plane. we were both shocked at what we saw. it had a shape like a rugby ball and a tail which we thought could have been flames from an engine. it kept its height until it appeared to descend a bit as it left our sight.
content.summary: Taking dogs for walk and saw bright light moving across sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking out our puppy at about 4:10am on 7/10/14, in salem ohio. i was watching a couple jets (prob commercial) fly off in different directions when what i thought was a star started moving.  it emitted a constant unwavering goldish bluish white light.  it went from a hover in the n-nw (around the direction i would travel to cleveland) and flew toward the s-se over columbia county. i can't approximate it's speed well as i didn't know if it was a smaller object closer to the ground or a larger object really high up.  but if i had to guess i would say it was about 500ft-1000ft from the ground and was probably going just as fast as a commercial jet at cruising speed. i heard no noise and it was a really quiet morning, but in all fairness i didn't hear engine noise from the jets either.   the object stopped moving and hovered for a few seconds the started traveling again instantly moving at the same or about the same speed in the same direction. i started to lose it behind the trees but could see the constant glow of its light between branches/leaves until it was gone.  there were no other flashing lights on the object at all.  could have been a drone i'm sure, or a plane reflecting the rising sun as i've seen happen before but not starting and stopping in mid air as it did.  the whole incident lasted a couple of minutes. all in all pretty cool to see.  if iphone could put a better camera on here i might have been able to get usable video but cells in the dark are always sketchy.  sorry everyone no useful photo/ video at all.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Goldish white-blue light. n-s moving fairly slow. stop hover continue

content.detailedDescription:
On 21st may 2014 i was photographing the night sky as i had learned night photography from a friend. so to experiment with the camera settings i went up on the terrace and started clicking with 30 seconds shutter speed of my dslr assembled on a tripod since the camera kept the shutter open for 30 second the screen used to go black so in that time i used to gaze at the sky after about 5 clicks at 19:54 i saw the ufo from my west and passed by above me not very far off to call a star and in the city you barely see any stars . it went from my west towards east above my head.. i shouted, abused,
 and it was just zooming by at a very good speed it went far off towards east and also visible for a good 20 seconds my heart was pounding i called up my father explained to him the scenario it was an amazing sight to see i tried explaining to my friends but they didn't believe. i can exactly tell the date and time is because i had my camera clicking the photograph of the night
content.summary: Ufo flew at a nearby distance and was visible for 20 seconds and later disappeared
